data.text:
Pooja Sharma is Nepali actress.

Nick Name: Pooja

Profession: Actress/Producer (Nepal)

Birth Date: April 30 1994

Birth Place: Sindhupalchowk, Nepal

Current City: Lalitpur, Nepal

Nationality: Nepalese

Religion: Hinduism

Family: Father, mother and Pooja. Lives with her mother who used to be teacher now as Housewife.

Sibling: None

School: School (Sudesha High School, Kathmandu)

Education level: Completed Bachelor in Tourism Management. (Kathmandu College of Tourism and Hospitality)

Zodiac Sign: Scorpio

Hobbies: Singing, Dancing & Traveling

Height: 5ft 6inch

Relationship status: Single

Tatoo : Yes, in right hand

Inspirrations: Her mother, Shahrukh KhanDebut Movie: Madhumas

Music Video: Many

Awards: Best Actress; Prem Geet

Song: Prem Katha with singer Anil Singh

Pooja Sharma was born in Sindhupalchowk, later her parents came to Kathmandu along with her. She completed her school and (+2) in Kathmandu. Then She went to Canada for her further study. She returned from Canada due to some medical reasons. She continued her study In Kathmandu and completed Bachelor degree. She have done many music videos. Currently She is most demanded and famous actress of Nepali film industry. Her name is often joined with Actor Akash Shrestha and Director/Actor Sudarshan Thapa.
